mapper.select: SELECT c.USER_ID AS userId, c.ITEM_ID AS itemId, c.AMOUNT AS amount, s.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, s.PRICE AS price FROM CART c JOIN SHOP s ON c.ITEM_ID = s.ITEM_ID WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (USER_ID, ITEM_ID, AMOUNT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{itemId}, #{amount})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
